Rohnert Park is located 50 miles north of San Francisco, and 10 miles south of Santa Rosa. 
The city is easily accessed through highway 101.

Rohnert Park is a small city of about 45,000 residents. The city of Rohnert Park, although beautiful, does not offer much regarding tourism.

The closest airports are Santa Rosa (STS), San Francisco (SFO) and Oakland (OAK).  The bus to the airport is Airport Express
Most people use a personal vehicle, however, there is a bus system and several taxis. The streets are very friendly for bikes, or walking.  The two main bus lines are Sonoma County Transit

Rohnert Park offers a Target, Walmart, Costco, Dollar Tree, Ashley Furniture, Home Depot, among others.

Rohnert Park offers many chain restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, A&W, Taco Bell, Burger King, In-and-Out Burger, Jack in the Box, Carls Jr, Popeye's, Baja Fresh, Panda Express, Juice Shack, Arby's, Subway, Quiznos, Port of Subs, TCBY, Cold Stone Creamery, Baskin Robbins, Olive Garden, Red Lobster, Chili's, Outback Steakhouse, Applebee's, Baker's Square, Sizzler, Fresh Choice, El Torito, IHop, Dominoes, Little Ceaser's, Straw Hat
